definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)

sentences.english: Washington should wait out the slow death of the Syrian regime.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿应该暂且不动，等候叙利亚政权的慢慢消失。

sentences.english: The next day I entered a large town which I shall not name.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我来到一个大的城镇，名字暂且不提。

sentences.english: Whether or not those desires can be satisfied is set aside.
sentences.chinese: 此类欲望是否能得到满足，我们暂且撇开不谈。

sentences.english: You are going to be blind, and for a time you will be unable to see the light of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 你要瞎眼，暂且不见日光。

sentences.english: One must draw back in order to leap further.
sentences.chinese: 为了挑得更远，必须暂且退后。

sentences.english: He wanted to stop but decided to continue for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 他原想停止，但又决定暂且继续干下去。

sentences.english: Please contain your enthusiasm for a moment.
So women are now contending with what we might call the new scarcity.
sentences.chinese: 因此，女性现在要应对新缺失，暂且让我们这么叫。

sentences.english: But aside from these and the marts of wealth and the crowded promenade.
sentences.chinese: 暂且不谈这集市财无亏密群遣散步不巍。

sentences.english: Call it the insect version of foreplay.
sentences.chinese: 暂且称之为昆虫式的性前戏吧。

sentences.english: It was the right hand side that I ignored for the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我暂且先忽略右手边的杯子。

sentences.english: Please try to govern your passions.
I suggest that you temporarily submit to others, and wait for the proper time to take action.
sentences.chinese: 建议你暂且雌伏于此，时机成熟再采取行动。

sentences.english: There are still a few jobs to finish off so we cannot be released for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 还有几项工作需要完成，所以我们暂且还不能松劲。

sentences.english: I don't want to discuss the reasons for the economic crisis happened.
sentences.chinese: 暂且不讨论经济危机发生的原因，说也阿七说不明白。

sentences.english: Let us ignore the animals and the Aliens.
sentences.chinese: 我们暂且不去讨论动物和外星人卖萌是什么意思。

definition: to throw out/to get rid of
something to be taken up later in speech or writing
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
